desc: Put a little SANiTi in your pocket...offering high quality Hand Sanitizers, Handbags, and Trending Accessories. SANiTi Hand Sanitizer is a pocket/purse sized hand sanitizer to help you and your loved ones stay healthy & sane while navigating through everyday life.

layout.text: QUALITY HAND SANITIZERS, HANDBAGS, ACCESSORIES & HOUSEHOLD ESSENTIALS!
